participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was well structured and the project manager did her job well.
It would have been better if we had more time to prepare but I think that everyone did well in their roles.
The discussion was a bit short and not much information was exchanged, that is the main negative point.

participant_actions.sent: Each member will present their ideas based on the role they have been given.
The project manager will lead the meeting.
The ID will present ideas on the working design.
The UIDwill present ideas on the technical functions design and the ME will give insight into the remote control market.

participant_decisions.sent: We decided that the remote control should be trendy but also cost effective.
We decided that it needs to have a universal design so that it can be sold internationally.
We also decided that it cannot be boring but stand out from the rest in an original way.

participant_problems.sent: Everyone was slightly unprepared but managed well under the circumstances.
I do not think that everyone got to read through all the information that was given before the meeting.
The questionaire took up most of our time before the meeting, leaving us ill prepared.
